_INSTRUCTIONS: Define what your plugin SHOULD extract from source_response_sample.json
_FORMAT: Array of MetricPoint objects (see src/domain/models.py for structure)
_HOW_TO_CREATE: 1. Look at each document in source_response_sample.json
- unit: Measurement unit (ms, s, bytes, count, etc.)
3. Write as MetricPoint JSON objects below

_NOTES.metric_name: Must match your KPI name from glossary
_NOTES.unit: Use consistent short units: ms, s, bytes, count, percent
_NOTES.dimensions: Only include filterable fields, avoid high-cardinality (user_id, etc.)
_NOTES.timestamp: Must be ISO 8601 format with timezone (typically UTC)
